item.title: Brian Robbins Calls Paramount-Skydance Merger ‘Bittersweet’ in Memo to Staff Amid His Exit as Co-CEO
item.description: Brian Robbins is Co-CEO of Paramount Global, and President and CEO of Paramount Pictures and Nickelodeon, is reflecting on his time at the company amid his exit following the Skydance merger. Read the

item.title: Paramount Co-CEO Brian Robbins Shares Farewell Memo as Skydance Deal Closes
item.description: The executive, who also heads up Paramount Pictures and Nickelodeon, was widely expected to depart once Skydance’s David Ellison realized his goal of owning a legacy Hollywood studio.
